Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 1 -- 19.39 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of nineteen and thirty-nine hundredths (19.39) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $6,088,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of giving additional support to the operation and maintenance of public elementary and secondary schools in St. Bernard Parish, including, without limitation, paying salaries and benefits of teachers and other School Board employees, said millage to represent a thirty-nine hundredths of a mill (.39) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 19 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 2 -- 3.06 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and six hundredths (3.06) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $960,825 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring school buses and instructional materials, and for the additional purpose of maintaining and operating school buildings and facilities, said millage to represent a six hundredths of a mill (.06) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 3 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 3 -- 9.44 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of nine and forty-four hundredths (9.44) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,964,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of paying salaries of school employees and giving additional support to public elementary and secondary schools and facilities in the District, said millage to represent a nineteen hundredths of a mill (.19) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 9.25 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?
